text: Oh, that movie was epic. What did you think, Charlie?
I don't— I don't know, man. I didn't really enjoy it that much, to be honest.
What?
Yeah.
Really?
Oh, okay. Okay. Look, to be completely fair.
I did really enjoy the scene when Bimblar went rogue and he beat that woman in the
head with the hammer. I thought it was artistically like tastefully done.
I thought it was a— A well done sequence.
It's funny. That was the part I really didn't like. Just too violent.
I think it's just 'cause he was unleashed. Hey, by the way you wanna get some food?
Uh, yeah I could eat.
Oh man. I could really go for some Salty's right now.
Isn't that like cheap, fast food or something?
What? Have you really ever been to Salty's?
Dude, you're gonna love this place I been coming here since I was a homonculus.
Charlie, this place doesn't seem very clean. There's grease all over the floor.
Ah, it's just part of the charm, man.
Welcome to Salty's.
I'm Simon S. Salty and I built this very restaurant with my own two hands.
And together with my funny mascot friends,
we work hard to give you the most quality —
— a supreme —
To give you that quality Salty's experience.
Unfortunately, the United States "FDA", the "FDA" has deemed my food a, quote, "hazard."
"Linked" to 15 deaths in the past four months alone.
Although, I'm rolling out some new and improved menu items. Come on, I'm Italian.
You can try my new Cucumber "Deluxe",
the Super Green Bowl and my personal favorite,
Salty Sourdough Bread Bust. So, come to Salty's and get your new and improved menu items.
Today!
Uh, I hate it when fast food restaurants do this healthy food shit.
First they took off the century egg and now this. Awesome.
What's a century egg?
Oh, it's like a Chinese egg that you bury the dirt and you dig it up and you eat it
after like 100 days. Um, I actually thought it was pretty good.
I liked it. I happened to like it.
I actually think the Cucumber "Deluxe" looks scrumptious.
